ti_ER {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%z%c%T%s%b%e%r" }
    }
    CountryISBNNumber { "232" }
    CountryNumber { "232" }
    CurrencyElements { 
            "$",
            "ERB ",
            ".",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Tigrigna language locale for Eritrea" }
        Source { "Ge'ez Frontier Foundation" }
        Address { "501 S Taylor St., Arlington, VA 22204, USA" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "locales@geez.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Tigrigna" }
        Territory { "Eritrea" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "0.1" }
        Date { "2000-12-08" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[yY].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[nN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "\u12A3\u1276" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "\u12C8G\u122A\u1275" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "\u12C8G\u122E" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "\u12C8G\u122A\u1275" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ".",
            ",",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4#,##0.00;-\u00A4#,##0.00",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "%c-%a-%l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "291" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            AmPmMarkers{
                    "\u1295\u1309\u1206 \u1230\u12D3\u1270",
                    "\u12F5\u1215\u122D \u1230\u12D3\u1275",
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hh:mm:ss aa",
                    "hh:mm:ss aa",
                    "hh:mm:ss aa",
                    "hh:mm:ss aa",
                    "dd/MMMM/yyyy",
                    "EEEE\u1363 MMM dd \u1218\u12D3\u120D\u1272 %l:mm:ss z yyyy",
                    "dd/MMMM/yyyy",
                    "dd/MMMM/yyyy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "\u1230\u1295\u1260\u1275",
                            "\u1230\u1291\u12ED",
                            "\u1230\u1209\u1235",
                            "\u1228\u1261\u12D5",
                            "\u1213\u1219\u1235",
                            "\u12D3\u122D\u1262",
                            "\u1240\u12F3\u121D",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "\u1230\u1295\u1260\u1275",
                            "\u1230\u1291\u12ED",
                            "\u1230\u1209\u1235",
                            "\u1228\u1261\u12D5",
                            "\u1213\u1219\u1235",
                            "\u12D3\u122D\u1262",
                            "\u1240\u12F3\u121D",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "\u1325\u122A",
                            "\u1208\u12AB\u1272",
                            "\u1218\u130B\u1262",
                            "\u121A\u12EB\u12DD",
                            "\u130D\u1295\u1266",
                            "\u1230\u1290",
                            "\u1213\u121D\u1208",
                            "\u1290\u1213\u1230",
                            "\u1218\u1235\u12A8",
                            "\u1325\u1245\u121D",
                            "\u1215\u12F3\u122D",
                            "\u1273\u1215\u1233",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "\u1325\u122A",
                            "\u1208\u12AB\u1272\u1275",
                            "\u1218\u130B\u1262\u1275",
                            "\u121A\u12EB\u12DD\u12EB",
                            "\u130D\u1295\u1266\u1275",
                            "\u1230\u1290",
                            "\u1213\u121D\u1208",
                            "\u1290\u1213\u1230",
                            "\u1218\u1235\u12A8\u1228\u121D",
                            "\u1325\u1245\u121D\u1272",
                            "\u1215\u12F3\u122D",
                            "\u1273\u1215\u1233\u1235",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
